question: Which global institution has announced a fast-track aid of USD 12 billion to combat the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak?
explanation:
The World Bank has recently announced a USD 12 billion fast-track aid package that will provide funds to help countries for tackling the coronavirus outbreak.
As per the notification of the World Bank President David Malpass, the funds are targeted to the poorest nations of the world and it can be used for medical equipment, health services or policy advice.
